info.title: Microsoft Dataverse (legacy)
info.description: Provides access to the environment database in Microsoft Dataverse.

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table collection

get.summary: Get row (legacy)
get.description: This operation retrieves the specified row for a table

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table collection

patch.description: This operation updates an existing row for a table

parameters.name: $apply
parameters.description: A sequence of OData aggregation transformations

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Related entries to include with requested entries (default = none)

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

SubscriptionRequest.description: Describes the subscription information for triggers.

NotificationUrl.description: Callback url to the flow engine. Expected as part of the request and provided by Flow.

UpdateTriggerSubscriptionRequest.description: Describes the subscription information for update trigger.

NotificationUrl.description: Callback url to the flow engine. Expected as part of the request and provided by Flow.

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution

DisplayCollectionName.description: Represents collection of table display names.

userLocalizedLabel.description: The user localized display name label object.

EntitiesDynamicValuesList.description: List of tables as dynamic values.

value.description: List of tables as dynamic values.

EntitiesDynamicValuesListItem.description: Represents a table as dynamic value item.

logicalName.description: The logical name of the table.

displayCollectionName.description: The display name of the table.

OrganizationsDynamicValuesList.description: List of organizations as dynamic values.

value.description: List of organizations as dynamic values.

OrganizationsDynamicValuesListItem.description: Represents a table as dynamic value item.

@odata.nextLink.description: The url to fetch next page data.

url.description: Callback url to the flow engine. Expected as part of the request and provided by Flow.

name.description: Callback registration name. Value will be replaced with workflow id

sdkmessagename.description: Choose an option or add your own

scope.description: Choose a scope to limit which rows can trigger the flow

filteringattributes.description: Enter a comma-separated list of column unique names. The flow triggers if any of them are modified

filterexpression.description: Enter an OData style filter expression to determine which rows can trigger the flow

postponeuntil.description: Enter a time to delay the trigger evaluation, eg. 2020-01-01T10:10:00Z

runas.description: Choose the running user for steps where invoker connections are used

label.description: The display name label of the table.

EntityRelationshipsDynamicValuesList.description: List of table relationship as dynamic values.

value.description: List of table relationships as dynamic values.

@odata.id.description: Enter the row URL using OData ID from a previous step or typing the full URL (eg. https://org0.crm.dynamics.com/api/data/v9.0/faxes(3ce6c728-3c8a-4b55-a4ee-a251b253c3ee)

ActionsDynamicValuesList.description: List of actions as dynamic values

value.description: List of actions as dynamic values

search.description: Enter a search term, eg. Contoso. Searches modifiers like boolean operators, wildcards, fuzzy search, proximity search etc. require the search type full

searchtype.description: Enter whether simple or full search syntax should be used (default is simple)

searchmode.description: Enter whether any or all of the search terms must be matched (default is any)

top.description: Enter the number of search results to be listed (default = 50)

filter.description: Enter an Odata style filter expression to narrow the search

entities.description: Enter a comma-separated list of tables to be searched (default is all tables)

items.description: Enter a table unique name to be searched (default is all tables)

orderby.description: Enter a comma-separated list of column unique names followed by asc or desc

items.description: Enter a column unique name followed by asc or desc

facets.description: Enter a comma-separated list of facet queries to narrow the search

items.description: Enter a facet query to narrow the search

skip.description: Enter the number of search results to be skipped

totalrecordcount.description: Total count of results (-1 if returntotalrecordcount is set to false)

WhenAnActionIsPerformedSubscriptionReque.description: The callback registration table for when an action is performed trigger.

url.description: Callback url to the flow engine. Expected as part of the request and provided by Flow.

name.description: Callback registration name. Value will be replaced with workflow id.

scope.description: Choose a scope to limit which rows can trigger the flow.

entityname.description: Choose a table to filter actions.
